resources.string: This is a Journal Application which tracks records of the tasks done or to be completed which includes title, date, start time, and end time. You can press the plus button which adds a new record to the list. There is also a delete button to delete one of the tasks. There is also an option to share the task via any messaging app installed on the phone.
Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
All fields need to be filled!
Start time must be less than End time!
